name: Grandmaster

auras.raw_description: Increases Magic Ally HP in all Battles by 17%.

skills.name: Hammerblows
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%

skills.name: Steel Crusher
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 40% chance of placing a 25% [Decrease ATK] debuff on the target for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Demoralizing Display
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff on the target for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
